query.name: findByDataset
query.sql: SELECT F.FILTER_ID, F.NAME, F.DESCRIPTION, F.SQL_STATEMENT, F.STATUS_ID, F.DATE_CREATED, F.DATE_UPDATED, F.OWNER_ID, F.UPDATE_ID FROM FILTER F, DATASET_FILTER DF WHERE F.FILTER_ID = DF.FILTER_ID AND F.FILTER_ID=?

query.name: create
query.sql: INSERT INTO FILTER (FILTER_ID,NAME, DESCRIPTION, SQL_STATEMENT, STATUS_ID, DATE_CREATED, OWNER_ID) VALUES (?,?,?,?,?,NOW(),?)

query.name: update
query.sql: UPDATE FILTER SET NAME=?, DESCRIPTION=?, STATUS_ID=?,SQL_STATEMENT=?,DATE_UPDATED=NOW(), UPDATE_ID=? WHERE FILTER_ID=?
